Title: Relates to the provision of patient health information and medical records
Summary: Relates to the provision of patient health information and medical records; expands the definition of medical records to include all health related records; prohibits fees for providing certain records.
LawCode: Amd §§17 & 18, Pub Health L; amd §33.16, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to patient health information and medical records
